main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on multiple occasions near San Nicolas Island, California, including descriptions of a cigar-shaped object and an oval metallic object.
interesting points: The cigar-shaped object was reported to be 4-5 ft in diameter and appeared to move off the ground for several seconds., Lt. Stephens reported seeing an oval metallic object approximately 25-30 ft in diameter traveling at a speed of 600-700 mph., Witnesses observed an object approximately half the size of the moon moving at high speeds with radical changes in direction., One report indicated that the object emitted a slight trail of vapor or smoke during the sighting., Multiple military personnel confirmed sightings of these unidentified aerial objects during routine patrols.
witness description: military personnel including Lt. James G. Stephens, Lt. W. S. Gates, and others
